chapters.title: Chapter 39: A Visit from Verin Sedai
chapters.info: Talene Minly, p. 608—Golden-haired Sitter for the Green Ajah in Tar Valon. She used to be Seaine's friend. She has no Warders, which is extremely unusual for a Green. When Pevara shielded her because she suspected her of being Black Ajah, she tried to stab her. She actually is a member of the Black Ajah, and is now sworn to obey Pevara and Seaine unconditionally. One of the three other Black sisters she knew of was Atuan. She was also exposed as a Black by Verin. She fled the Tower weeks ago, most likely released from her Oaths and captivity by either Mesaana or Shaidar Haran.
